text: @BernieSanders Not true. (Note: not a Trump fan; not American). What you mean is, Trump doesn't go along with science "fashion" i.e. Global Warming & Leftist demands on how to handle COVID19, to wit: take away freedom, give ppl the "gift" of Socialism. A gift that never gives anything good back
